name: Hyperspace Slingshot
description:
Hyperspace Slingshot tasks the player with collecting space trash to fill up their spaceship's SlingDrive™. When they gather enough, the SlingDrive™ activates, and they can proceed to the next level.

While traveling and gathering the player needs to collect the garbage by hitting it with the back of their space ship (To load the slingshot!). Hitting trash from the front, or hitting a bomb at all, will damage the player.

Controls
SPACE : Jump To SlingSpace
←↑↓→ (Arrow Keys) : Move

Code
Andrew Dunetz (AllBetsAreOff)

Art and Illustration
InstantTrain
QueenKrissu

Engine
LÖVE

Created for Ludum Dare 47!
